Description:
Detects disabling of Multi Factor Authentication.

Author: Splunk Threat Research Team (original rule), Harjot Singh @cyb3rjy0t (sigma rule)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disabling Multi Factor Authentication
Query: sourcetype='m365-audit' eql select * from _source_ where operation like '%disable strong authentication.%'
